translations: 心境量表（Profile of Mood States）；生产和经营管理学会（Production and Operations Management Society）

sentences.sentence: Slippers crowned with tulle pom-poms will satisfy the longings of future prima-ballerinas.
sentences.translation: 顶部饰有绒球的拖鞋会满足那些未来芭蕾舞团首席女演员愿望。

sentences.sentence: As the new colors mingled with the red, I realized the performance means meant more than funny pom-poms.
sentences.translation: 随着红色慢慢混入各种各样新的颜色，我慢慢明白这场表演想要表达的不仅仅是搞笑的毛绒球。

sentences.sentence: This set of colorful fairy crown pillows are accented with satin and lace and topped with cheery yellow pom-poms.
sentences.translation: 这套彩色的仙女花冠枕头用绸缎，饰带做成，顶部有黄色的镶珠。
